title: Composing neuro-symbolic control planes
description: Prototyping an adaptive AI execution fabric that fuses agentic planners, retrieval meshes, and live observability into a cohesive control plane for upcoming services.

title: October 2025 路 Algorithmic readiness game-days
description: Running tabletop scenarios that interrogate threat models, bias regressions, and recovery choreography across AI and AI-assisted production pipelines.

title: November 2025 路 Autonomous incident simulations
description: Extending the tabletop program into instrumented simulations that rehearse autonomous guardrails, policy enforcement, and red-team escalation loops before launch.

title: Preparing 路 Agentic workflow accelerators
description: Prototyping compact agentic systems that combine human-in-the-loop validation with autonomous flows to compress analysis and change-management cycles.

title: Shipped 路 Hybrid tokenizer research
description: Delivered a hybrid tokenizer for tokenization, ranking, embedding, and AST code generation workloads by merging statistical segmentation with grammar-aware parsing.
